changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.comment: create tables for new contact structure (will be renamed later on)

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.comment: Copy data from old tables into new tables.
changeSet.sql:
insert data from old contacts table into temporary table (at first only for billing addresses)
INSERT INTO TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES ( BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, BILLING_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, BILLING_ADDRESS_DELETED, BILLING_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, BILLING_ADDRESS_NAME, BILLING_ADDRESS_STREET, BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, BILLING_ADDRESS_ZIP, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_DTYPE, BILLING_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY, BILLING_CONTACT_COMPANY, BILLING_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE, BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, BILLING_CONTACT_DELETED, BILLING_CONTACT_DISCOUNT, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, BILLING_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, BILLING_CONTACT_GENDER, BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIED, BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY, BILLING_CONTACT_NAME, BILLING_CONTACT_NOTE, BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, BILLING_CONTACT_RELIABILITY, BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_TITLE, BILLING_CONTACT_USENETGROSS, BILLING_CONTACT_USESALESEQUALIZATIONTAX, BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDFROM, BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDTO, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBERVALID, BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME, BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSITE, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ALTERNATECONTACT, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_BANKACCOUNT, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_CATEGORY, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_PAYMENT ) SELECT a1.ID, a1.CITY, a1.CITYADDON, a1.COUNTRYCODE, a1.DATEADDED, a1.DELETED, a1.MANUALADDRESS, a1.MODIFIED, a1.MODIFIEDBY, a1.NAME, a1.STREET, a1.VALIDFROM, a1.VALIDTO, a1.ZIP, c1.id, c1.DTYPE, c1.BIRTHDAY, c1.COMPANY, c1.CONTACTTYPE, c1.CUSTOMERNUMBER, c1.DATEADDED, c1.DELETED, c1.DISCOUNT, c1.EMAIL, c1.FAX, c1.FIRSTNAME, c1.GENDER, c1.GLN, c1.MANDATEREFERENCE, c1.MOBILE, c1.MODIFIED, c1.MODIFIEDBY, c1.NAME, c1.NOTE, c1.PHONE, c1.RELIABILITY, c1.SUPPLIERNUMBER, c1.TITLE, c1.USENETGROSS, c1.USESALESEQUALIZATIONTAX, c1.VALIDFROM, c1.VALIDTO, c1.VATNUMBER, c1.VATNUMBERVALID, c1.WEBSHOPNAME, c1.WEBSITE, c1.FK_ADDRESS, c1.FK_ALTERNATECONTACT, c1.FK_BANKACCOUNT, c1.FK_CATEGORY, c1.FK_PAYMENT FROM FKT_CONTACT c1 LEFT JOIN FKT_ADDRESS a1 ON c1.fk_address = a1.id WHERE c1.CONTACTTYPE = 0 /* Billing contacts */;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.comment: update addresses (merge delivery contacts into existing billing contacts)
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES SELECT t.BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_DELETED, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_NAME, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_STREET, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_ZIP, t.BILLING_CONTACT_ID, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DTYPE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_COMPANY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DELETED, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DISCOUNT, t.BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, t.BILLING_CONTACT_GENDER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIED, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_NAME, t.BILLING_CONTACT_NOTE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_RELIABILITY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_TITLE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_USENETGROSS, t.BILLING_CONTACT_USESALESEQUALIZATIONTAX, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDFROM, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDTO, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBERVALID, t.BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME, t.BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSITE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ALTERNATECONTACT, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_BANKACCOUNT, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_CATEGORY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_PAYMENT, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DELETED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_NAME, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_ID, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DTYPE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_COMPANY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DATEADDED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DELETED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DISCOUNT, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_GENDER, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_GLN, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_NAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_NOTE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_TITLE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDFROM, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDTO, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSITE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS FROM FKT_CONTACT s, TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES t where t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ALTERNATECONTACT = s.id ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DELIVERY_CONTACT_ID = s.ID, DELIVERY_CONTACT_DTYPE = s.DTYPE, DELIVERY_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY = s.BIRTHDAY, DELIVERY_CONTACT_COMPANY = s.COMPANY, DELIVERY_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE = s.CONTACTTYPE, DELIVERY_CONTACT_DATEADDED = s.DATEADDED, DELIVERY_CONTACT_DELETED = s.DELETED, DELIVERY_CONTACT_DISCOUNT = s.DISCOUNT, DELIVERY_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME = s.FIRSTNAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_GENDER = s.GENDER, DELIVERY_CONTACT_GLN = s.GLN, DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIED = s.MODIFIED, DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY = s.MODIFIEDBY, DELIVERY_CONTACT_NAME = s.NAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_NOTE = s.NOTE, DELIVERY_CONTACT_TITLE = s.TITLE, DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDFROM = s.VALIDFROM, DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDTO = s.VALIDTO, DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME = s.WEBSHOPNAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSITE = s.WEBSITE, DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS = s.FK_ADDRESS;

MERGE INTO TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES t USING FKT_CONTACT s ON t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ALTERNATECONTACT = s.id WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_ID = s.ID, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DTYPE = s.DTYPE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY = s.BIRTHDAY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_COMPANY = s.COMPANY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE = s.CONTACTTYPE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DATEADDED = s.DATEADDED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DELETED = s.DELETED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DISCOUNT = s.DISCOUNT, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME = s.FIRSTNAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_GENDER = s.GENDER, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_GLN = s.GLN, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIED = s.MODIFIED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY = s.MODIFIEDBY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_NAME = s.NAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_NOTE = s.NOTE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_TITLE = s.TITLE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDFROM = s.VALIDFROM, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDTO = s.VALIDTO, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME = s.WEBSHOPNAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSITE = s.WEBSITE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS = s.FK_ADDRESS;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES SELECT t.BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_DELETED, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_NAME, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_STREET, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, t.BILLING_ADDRESS_ZIP, t.BILLING_CONTACT_ID, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DTYPE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_COMPANY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DELETED, t.BILLING_CONTACT_DISCOUNT, t.BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, t.BILLING_CONTACT_GENDER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIED, t.BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_NAME, t.BILLING_CONTACT_NOTE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_RELIABILITY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_TITLE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_USENETGROSS, t.BILLING_CONTACT_USESALESEQUALIZATIONTAX, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDFROM, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDTO, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, t.BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBERVALID, t.BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME, t.BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSITE, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_ALTERNATECONTACT, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_BANKACCOUNT, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_CATEGORY, t.BILLING_CONTACT_FK_PAYMENT, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DELETED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_NAME, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_ID, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DTYPE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_COMPANY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_CONTACTTYPE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DATEADDED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DELETED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_DISCOUNT, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_GENDER, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_GLN, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIED, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_NAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_NOTE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_TITLE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDFROM, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDTO, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_WEBSITE, t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS FROM FKT_ADDRESS s, TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES t where t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS = s.id ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID = s.ID, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY = s.CITY, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON = s.CITYADDON, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE = s.COUNTRYCODE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DATEADDED = s.DATEADDED, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DELETED = s.DELETED, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS = s.MANUALADDRESS, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIED = s.MODIFIED, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY = s.MODIFIEDBY, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_NAME = s.NAME, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET = s.STREET, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM = s.VALIDFROM, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDTO = s.VALIDTO, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP = s.ZIP;

MERGE INTO TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES t USING FKT_ADDRESS s ON t.DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS = s.id WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID = s.ID, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY = s.CITY, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON = s.CITYADDON, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE = s.COUNTRYCODE, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DATEADDED = s.DATEADDED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DELETED = s.DELETED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS = s.MANUALADDRESS, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIED = s.MODIFIED, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY = s.MODIFIEDBY, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_NAME = s.NAME, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET = s.STREET, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM = s.VALIDFROM, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDTO = s.VALIDTO, t.DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP = s.ZIP;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TMP_FKT_CONTACT ( ID, DTYPE, BIRTHDAY, COMPANY, CUSTOMERNUMBER, DATEADDED, DELETED, DISCOUNT, FIRSTNAME, GENDER, GLN, MANDATEREFERENCE, MODIFIED, MODIFIEDBY, NAME, NOTE, RELIABILITY, SUPPLIERNUMBER, TITLE, USENETGROSS, USESALESEQUALIZATIONTAX, VALIDFROM, VALIDTO, VATNUMBER, VATNUMBERVALID, WEBSHOPNAME, WEBSITE, FK_BANKACCOUNT, FK_CATEGORY, FK_PAYMENT, OLD_ID ) SELECT BILLING_CONTACT_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_DTYPE, BILLING_CONTACT_BIRTHDAY, BILLING_CONTACT_COMPANY, BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, BILLING_CONTACT_DELETED, BILLING_CONTACT_DISCOUNT, BILLING_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, BILLING_CONTACT_GENDER, BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIED, BILLING_CONTACT_MODIFIEDBY, BILLING_CONTACT_NAME, BILLING_CONTACT_NOTE, BILLING_CONTACT_RELIABILITY, BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_TITLE, BILLING_CONTACT_USENETGROSS, BILLING_CONTACT_USESALESEQUALIZATIONTAX, BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDFROM, BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDTO, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBERVALID, BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSHOPNAME, BILLING_CONTACT_WEBSITE, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_BANKACCOUNT, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_CATEGORY, BILLING_CONTACT_FK_PAYMENT, BILLING_CONTACT_ID FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TMP_FKT_ADDRESS ( ID, CITY, CITYADDON, COUNTRYCODE, DATEADDED, DELETED, EMAIL, FAX, MOBILE, MODIFIED, MODIFIEDBY, NAME, PHONE, STREET, VALIDFROM, VALIDTO, ZIP, FK_CONTACT, CONTACT_ADDRESSES ) SELECT BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, BILLING_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, BILLING_ADDRESS_DELETED, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, BILLING_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, BILLING_ADDRESS_NAME, BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, BILLING_ADDRESS_STREET, BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, BILLING_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, BILLING_ADDRESS_ZIP, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_ID FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: insert into FKT_ADDRESS_CONTACTTYPES (ADDRESS_CONTACTTYPES, T_ELEMENT) select BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, 'BILLING' from TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
rheydenr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TMP_FKT_ADDRESS ( ID, CITY, CITYADDON, COUNTRYCODE, DATEADDED, DELETED, EMAIL, FAX, MOBILE, MODIFIED, MODIFIEDBY, NAME, PHONE, STREET, VALIDFROM, VALIDTO, ZIP, FK_CONTACT, CONTACT_ADDRESSES ) SELECT DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DATEADDED, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_DELETED, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIED, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MODIFIEDBY, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_NAME, BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDFROM, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_VALIDTO, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_ID FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES WHERE DELIVERY_CONTACT_ID IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: DocumentReceivers (BILLING) for all documents INSERT INTO FKT_DOCUMENTRECEIVER ( BILLINGTYPE, CITY, CITYADDON, COMPANY, CONSULTANT, COUNTRYCODE, CUSTOMERNUMBER, DATEADDED, EMAIL, FAX, FIRSTNAME, NAME, GENDER, GLN, MANDATEREFERENCE, MANUALADDRESS, MOBILE, ORIGINADDRESSID, ORIGINCONTACTID, PHONE, STREET, SUPPLIERNUMBER, TITLE, VATNUMBER, ZIP, FK_DOCUMENT, VALIDFROM ) SELECT d.billingtype, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, BILLING_CONTACT_COMPANY, d.consultant, BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, BILLING_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, BILLING_CONTACT_NAME, BILLING_CONTACT_GENDER, BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, BILLING_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, BILLING_ADDRESS_STREET, BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_TITLE, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, BILLING_ADDRESS_ZIP, d.id, BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDFROM FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES, FKT_DOCUMENT d WHERE d.fk_contact = billing_contact_id and d.dtype != 'Delivery';

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql:
DocumentReceivers (delivery address) for all documents. Some attributes like customer number e-mail, fax, mobile, phone are copied from BILLING_CONTACT fields.
INSERT INTO FKT_DOCUMENTRECEIVER ( BILLINGTYPE, CITY, CITYADDON, COMPANY, CONSULTANT, COUNTRYCODE, CUSTOMERNUMBER, DATEADDED, EMAIL, FAX, FIRSTNAME, NAME, GENDER, GLN, MANDATEREFERENCE, MANUALADDRESS, MOBILE, ORIGINADDRESSID, ORIGINCONTACTID, PHONE, STREET, SUPPLIERNUMBER, TITLE, VATNUMBER, ZIP, FK_DOCUMENT, VALIDFROM ) SELECT '5', /* delivery address */ DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, DELIVERY_CONTACT_COMPANY, d.consultant, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, DELIVERY_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_NAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_GENDER, BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, /* delivery contact address is related to billing (main) contact */ BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET, BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, DELIVERY_CONTACT_TITLE, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP, d.id, DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDFROM FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES JOIN FKT_DOCUMENT d ON (d.fk_contact = billing_contact_id) AND delivery_contact_id IS NOT NULL and d.dtype != 'Delivery';

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql: DocumentReceivers (DELIVERY) for all documents INSERT INTO FKT_DOCUMENTRECEIVER ( BILLINGTYPE, CITY, CITYADDON, COMPANY, CONSULTANT, COUNTRYCODE, CUSTOMERNUMBER, DATEADDED, EMAIL, FAX, FIRSTNAME, NAME, GENDER, GLN, MANDATEREFERENCE, MANUALADDRESS, MOBILE, ORIGINADDRESSID, ORIGINCONTACTID, PHONE, STREET, SUPPLIERNUMBER, TITLE, VATNUMBER, ZIP, FK_DOCUMENT, VALIDFROM ) /* DocumentReceivers for DELIVERY have a switched address (common billing address for other document types is the delivery address in this special case), the delivery address is therefore to interpret as billing address. Since the records are already in the database we only have to switch the billing type.*/ SELECT CASE WHEN DELIVERY_CONTACT_FK_ADDRESS is null THEN '5' ELSE '0' END AS BillingType, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITY, BILLING_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, BILLING_CONTACT_COMPANY, d.consultant, BILLING_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, BILLING_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, BILLING_CONTACT_NAME, BILLING_CONTACT_GENDER, BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, BILLING_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, BILLING_ADDRESS_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, BILLING_ADDRESS_STREET, BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_TITLE, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, BILLING_ADDRESS_ZIP, d.id, BILLING_CONTACT_VALIDFROM FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES, FKT_DOCUMENT d WHERE d.fk_contact = billing_contact_id and d.dtype = 'Delivery';

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.sql:
DocumentReceivers (delivery address) for all documents. Some attributes like customer number e-mail, fax, mobile, phone are copied from BILLING_CONTACT fields.
INSERT INTO FKT_DOCUMENTRECEIVER ( BILLINGTYPE, CITY, CITYADDON, COMPANY, CONSULTANT, COUNTRYCODE, CUSTOMERNUMBER, DATEADDED, EMAIL, FAX, FIRSTNAME, NAME, GENDER, GLN, MANDATEREFERENCE, MANUALADDRESS, MOBILE, ORIGINADDRESSID, ORIGINCONTACTID, PHONE, STREET, SUPPLIERNUMBER, TITLE, VATNUMBER, ZIP, FK_DOCUMENT, VALIDFROM ) SELECT '5', /* delivery address */ DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITY, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_CITYADDON, DELIVERY_CONTACT_COMPANY, d.consultant, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_COUNTRYCODE, BILLING_CONTACT_CUSTOMERNUMBER, BILLING_CONTACT_DATEADDED, BILLING_CONTACT_EMAIL, BILLING_CONTACT_FAX, DELIVERY_CONTACT_FIRSTNAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_NAME, DELIVERY_CONTACT_GENDER, BILLING_CONTACT_GLN, BILLING_CONTACT_MANDATEREFERENCE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_MANUALADDRESS, BILLING_CONTACT_MOBILE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ID, BILLING_CONTACT_ID, /* delivery contact address is related to billing (main) contact */ BILLING_CONTACT_PHONE, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_STREET, BILLING_CONTACT_SUPPLIERNUMBER, DELIVERY_CONTACT_TITLE, BILLING_CONTACT_VATNUMBER, DELIVERY_ADDRESS_ZIP, d.id, DELIVERY_CONTACT_VALIDFROM FROM TMP_CONTACTS_WITH_ADDRESSES JOIN FKT_DOCUMENT d ON (d.fk_contact = billing_contact_id) AND delivery_contact_id IS NOT NULL and d.dtype = 'Delivery';

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.comment: Update DocumentReceivers. If a DocumentReceiver has a manual address, the contact and address field has to be cleared.

changeSet.author: rheydenr
changeSet.comment: Rename old tables, delete not necessary temp tables and switch temporary tables to active tables.
